text: National Journal is a political magazine based in Washington, D.C.National Journal: Kevin Turpin page It stopped being a weekly magazine in December 2015 after 46 years of publication. National Journal later became a paid membership model in 2011 and began giving strategic research and analysis through public policy professionals. National Journal now serves over 1,000 members from both the public and private sectors. ==References== Category:Companies based in Washington, D.C. Category:Magazines
title: National Journal
